Trade/Device Name(s): BD MiniDraw Capillary Blood Collection System with BD MiniDraw H&H Capillary Blood Collection Tube
BD MiniDraw H&H Capillary Blood Collection Tube
BD MiniDraw Capillary Tube Adapter H&H
Specimen Container(s): BD MiniDraw H&H Capillary Blood Collection Tube
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Transport and storage of capillary blood
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD MiniDraw Capillary Blood Collection System with BD MiniDraw H&H Capillary Blood Collection Tube for collection, anticoagulation, transport, and storage of capillary blood for hemoglobin and hematocrit measurement on Sysmex XN-Series systems
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for collection, anticoagulation, transport, and storage of capillary whole blood samples from adults for measurement of hemoglobin and hematocrit when analyzed on Sysmex XN-Series systems; use restricted to trained healthcare workers
